invalid_basic_authorization.description: The application id or application key are not configured properly.

invalid_token.description: The token was not valid in form or expired.

invalid_ip_address.description: This IP address is not authorized for API access.

internal_error.description: When error on the server side occurs

invalid_profile.description: When request does not have the privilege or is sent from the wrong profile

invalid_license.description: When the team license not valid.

team_user_token_expired.description: When the token carried in request expires.

team_user_token_refreshed.description: When the token is validified and modified(prolongation, etc.).

invalid_license.description: When the management license is not valid.

team_username_is_already_registered.description: When the document matched by provided team username already has a password.

invalid_team_username.description: When the no document is matched with provided team username.

invalid_team_password.description: When the no document is matched with provided team username and password.

team_registration_failed.description: When attempting to find one added team document in management and to activate by adding password failed

can_not_delete_user.description: When error occurs when deleting a user.

invalid_team_user_token.description: When a team user login request has a token that is invalid (deprecated or expired). Please login in with username and password again.

invalid_team_credentials.description: When team username, password or other credential fields provided were invalid.

invalid_user_token.description: When the user token is not valid.

user_token_expired.description: When the token carried in request expires.

user_token_refreshed.description: When the token is validified and modified (prolonged, etc.).

username_is_already_registered.description: When username for new user doc is found already exist.

invalid_username.description: When username is faulty in format, content legality, etc.

invalid_password.description: When password is faulty in format.

can_not_delete_user.description: When error occurs when deleting a user.

invalid_team_user_token.description: When a team user login request has a token that is invalid (deprecated or expired). Please login in with username and password again.

invalid_credentials.description: The username, password or other credential fields provided were invalid.
